```{r}

dim( bcrabl )
```



```{r}
str(bcrabl$mol.biol)
```

```{r}

```


```{r}
t.test(age ~ mol.biol, bcrabl)
```



```{r}
library(ggplot2)
ggplot(bcrabl, aes(x = mol.biol, y = age))
```


```{r}
ggplot(bcrabl, aes(x = mol.biol, y = age)) + geom_boxplot()
```
